comments:
The JIRA server is running OK (I can access it via Web Browser). When I add the repository in mylar, the "validate settings" also works. It prompts: "Valid Jira found and your login accepted"

When I add a query in the "Task List" UI and try to synchronize it with Jira, I got the following errors in the PDE Error Log and nothing was returned:
Could not login to server:http://localhost:8080Check network connection.

When I double-clicked the message, I got the following stack trace messages:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.rss.RSSFeedProcessorCallback.isXMLOrRSS(RSSFeedProcessorCallback.java:156)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.rss.RSSFeedProcessorCallback.execute(RSSFeedProcessorCallback.java:61)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.JiraWebSession.doInSession(JiraWebSession.java:66)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.web.rss.RSSJiraFilterService.findIssues(RSSJiraFilterService.java:42)
	at org.tigris.jira.internal.core.service.soap.SoapJiraService.findIssues(SoapJiraService.java:391)
	at org.tigris.jira.core.service.CachedRpcJiraServer.search(CachedRpcJiraServer.java:449)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.JiraRepositoryConnector.performQuery(JiraRepositoryConnector.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.SynchronizeQueryJob.run(SynchronizeQueryJob.java:82)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
